title: Rent The Runway’s IPO, Southwest’s Flight Cancellations and Friend of Pivot Eli Saslow
description:
Kara and Scott discuss Southwest’s flight cancellations, Rent The Runway's IPO filing, and Nick Clegg’s non-apology tour. Also, Ireland wants American companies to pay more in taxes and Tesla is moving to Texas. Plus, Friend of Pivot Eli Saslow on his new book, Voices From The Pandemic: Americans Tell Their Stories of Crisis, Courage, and Resilience. 
You can find Eli on Twitter at @elisaslow.
Send us your Listener Mail questions, via Yappa, at nymag.com/pivot.
Learn more about your ad choices. Visit podcastchoices.com/adchoices
